java.lang.Object addVaadinArtefactToGrails(java.lang.Class artefact, org.codehaus.groovy.grails.commons.GrailsApplication grailsApplication)

Currently (to v2.0.2) GrailsApplication.addArtefact() will add multiple copies of the same class.

Method Detail

addVaadinArtefactToGrails

java.lang.Object addVaadinArtefactToGrails(java.lang.Class artefact, org.codehaus.groovy.grails.commons.GrailsApplication grailsApplication)
Currently (to v2.0.2) GrailsApplication.addArtefact() will add multiple copies of the same class. So this method first checks if the class has already been added to GrailsApplication, and only calls the addArtefact method if it hasn't been added already.
